intro: Rondeletia micarensis, commonly known as the pink rondeletia, is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly Brazil. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. It thrives in warm, humid climates and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions.
